column2: Found Dead; T1- nape of neck
DCT-TVA (NEG); Braf f/f; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Found Dead (rigor mortis- died recently); T1- nape of neck
Brain was somewhat mushy but intact
Massive internal tumor burden affecting lungs & liver
Difficult to distinguish lung tissue from tumor tissue
Pieces of lung metastasis taken for histology
Mouse originally genotyped TVA-neg -- tail clipped at necropsy for re-genotyping
